Hi Anmol,

In my experience, these two URLs are usually distinct documents where 
the first one is redirect to the second one. So, in most cases you want 
to get them both. However, if you are not interested in replaying 
harvested documents you can choose not save redirects by using filters 
on ARCWriter (or some other writer). Or you can easily add a new regular 
expression cannon rule to avoid getting both. In this case be sure that 
URLs that you shown below are really duplicates.

I hope this helps.
i.


> I am pretty certain there is something I am not doing right, just that I 
> am trying to pin point the issue.
> 
> I am seeing pages
> http://xyz.com/target
> and
> http://xyz.com/target/
> 
> both fetched separately. Any Pointers are greatly appreciated.
> 
> Anmol
>
